医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
创新的适体乳膏有望治疗小鼠过敏性接触性皮炎波恩大学的研究人员分离出了一种适合对抗小鼠过敏性接触性皮炎的 DNA 分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Innovative-aptamer-cream-shows-promise-in-treating-allergic-contact-dermatitis-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Innovative-aptamer-cream-shows-promise-in-treating-allergic-contact-dermatitis-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2621f9aa-5219-4e23-9210-7a1cb21b2703 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 20:54:00 -0400 Innovative aptamer cream shows promise in treating allergic contact dermatitis in mice
中国宫颈癌预防的最新进展和挑战最近的研究结果突显了中国在宫颈癌预防方面的重大进展和挑战，特别是农村地区发病率和死亡率的上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Recent-advancements-and-challenges-in-cervical-cancer-prevention-in-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Recent-advancements-and-challenges-in-cervical-cancer-prevention-in-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=902936db-1b54-4ced-b458-027fcaeba371 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 20:40:35 -0400 Recent advancements and challenges in cervical cancer prevention in China
斯坦福大学研究人员发现克服胰腺癌化疗耐药性的关键胰腺癌是一种特别具有侵袭性且难以治疗的癌症，部分原因是它通常对化疗具有耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Stanford-researchers-uncover-key-to-overcoming-chemoresistance-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Stanford-researchers-uncover-key-to-overcoming-chemoresistance-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef2ae62f-1aa6-43b3-8130-5dd39cf71c00 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 20:33:07 -0400 Stanford researchers uncover key to overcoming chemoresistance in pancreatic cancer
让癌细胞对抗自身以克服耐药性治疗癌症有时感觉就像打地鼠游戏。这种疾病可能会对治疗产生耐药性，而临床医生永远不知道何时、何地以及何种情况可能会出现耐药性，从而使他们落后了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Turning-cancer-cells-against-themselves-to-overcome-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Turning-cancer-cells-against-themselves-to-overcome-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abfeeaf2-c8c7-4696-8f0b-17ecad3afdd0 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 20:29:28 -0400 Turning cancer cells against themselves to overcome drug resistance
通过心脏磁共振成像加强心力衰竭管理宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心力衰竭（HF）是一种临床综合征，具有多种临床表现、病理生理学和自然史。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Enhancing-heart-failure-management-with-cardiac-Magnetic-resonance-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Enhancing-heart-failure-management-with-cardiac-Magnetic-resonance-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bebf677f-504f-4650-ad5f-88c999c6471e Thu, 04 Jul 2024 20:23:47 -0400 Enhancing heart failure management with cardiac magnetic resonance imaging
超过 1,000 个 DNA 微小变化会影响初潮年龄研究人员检查了近 800,000 名女性的 DNA，以探索青春期时间的复杂性。他们确定了与初潮时间相关的信号，并研究了它们对青春期开始的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/More-than-1000-small-changes-in-DNA-identified-that-influence-age-of-first-period.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/More-than-1000-small-changes-in-DNA-identified-that-influence-age-of-first-period.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a22e6c2f-0de8-4291-9083-c16b6a0c663e Thu, 04 Jul 2024 09:17:00 -0400 More than 1,000 small changes in DNA identified that influence age of first period

科学家揭示KLF15转录因子在白色脂肪细胞中的作用，为肥胖治疗开辟新途径研究人员发现，KLF15 对于维持皮下脂肪中的白色脂肪细胞特性至关重要，其缺失会诱导米色脂肪细胞特性，这表明了新的肥胖治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Scientists-unveil-KLF15-transcription-factors-role-in-white-fat-cells-opening-new-paths-for-obesity-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240704/Scientists-unveil-KLF15-transcription-factors-role-in-white-fat-cells-opening-new-paths-for-obesity-therapy.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74a85387-f5d0-4ead-bcaa-a0efbf7eafa9 Thu, 04 Jul 2024 01:44:00 -0400 Scientists unveil KLF15 transcription factor's role in white fat cells, opening new paths for obesity therapy
